gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 133, Nets 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Nets, 133-111. Tyrese Haliburton recorded 27 points (4-7 3PM) and 13 assists for the Pacers, with Jalen Smith adding 17 points and 10 rebounds in the victory. Cam Thomas tallied 22 points and two assists for the Nets in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 43-33, while the Nets fall to 29-47.
